attributes.action: GIve a knighthood to Geoffrey Boycott
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Boycott is one of the greatest cricketers of all-time. His 8114 test runs were once a record, while no-one has scored as many first class runs at such a high average. Since retirement Boycott has become a successful broadcaster, remaining the most famous living Yorkshireman.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office Ceremonial Secretariat is now actively seeking direct applications for honours. Please visit http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
